text: The patient is a 65-year-old male with a history of diabetes and hypertension.
A new iPhone model was released with better battery life and improved camera.
MRI findings suggest a torn ACL and mild inflammation in the right knee.
The global economy is seeing an upward trend in inflation and interest rates.
The CT scan shows a left lung nodule with no signs of metastasis.
Apple’s stock prices increased following strong quarterly earnings.
Diabetes mellitus is managed with insulin and dietary restrictions.
The Fed has announced a change in monetary policy due to rising inflation.
The radiology report mentions bilateral pleural effusion and cardiomegaly.
Samsung unveiled its latest foldable phone at the tech conference.
